name: Shinobi's Way - a jigsaw chess tale
name_original: Shinobi's Way - a jigsaw chess tale
description:
An innovative jigsaw puzzle with chess-shaped pieces! Solve the puzzles to follow the story that inspired Chess Knights: Shinobi.

Featuring:
  • Innovative chess-shaped jigsaw puzzle;
  • Play it with regular jigsaw pieces as well;
  • Uncover the story that inspired Chess Knights: Shinobi by solving 6 different jigsaw puzzles;
  • 4 different sizes for each game mode: Chess-shaped pieces (98, 148, 327 or 580 pieces) and regular pieces (66, 144, 220 or 510 pieces)
  • Beautiful soundtrack;
